dmca.title: [AB-C40818B] [382664] Unauthorized Use of the VeriSign Secured Seal or logo (http://w
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the web page www.beldecal.com/candle_decals.cfm any of
the material that you claim is being infringed as of 4:38:32 p.m. (GMT-6).

Legal Response Team
ThePlanet.com
